entity.name: Updates on Covid-19 in Kenya
entity.description: This page provides real-time updates on the Covid-19 situation from trusted and official sources.

text:
The outcome of the targeted  testing exercise has shown a very low turnout. In the last 2 days, we have tested 803 against a target of 2000 in Kawangware &494 in Eastleigh against a target of 3000. We are appealing to Kenyans to willingly come forward to be tested.
#KomeshaCorona
